body.name: Maxi-Cosi Pria Max All-in-One Convertible Car Seat, rear-facing, from 4-40 pounds; forward-facing to 65 pounds; and up to 100 pounds in booster mode, Nomad Black
features: 3-In-1 convertible car seat: rear-facing, from 4-40 pounds; forward-facing to 65 pounds; and up to 100 pounds in Booster mode
Side Impact protection technology with GCell protects your child's head where it's needed most in a side impact crash
Clipquik auto-magnetic chest clip gets you on your way quickly
Out-of-the-way spring assisted harness covers for easy boarding
Flip away buckle won't get in the way while getting in and out of the convertible car seat
body.description: Because they grow up so fast. If you're reading this, you know all too well that choosing the right car seat is a tedious, scary, and super important decision. Why go through it more than once? Seriously, what parent has time for that? Thankfully, the Pria 3-in-1 may just be the only car seat you'll ever need. (Unless, that is, yet another little one comes along - but we'll cross that bridge when we get there.) see, the Pria 3-in-1 is built to grow with your child. And, most importantly, you can convert to new seat stages in mere seconds - because trust us, growth spurts really do happen overnight. Bottom line? The pria's here for the long haul. 3-In-1 conversion that's crazy easy - switch from rear-facing (4-40 lbs) to forward-facing (up to 65 lbs) to booster seat (up to 100 lbs) With the touch of a button ClipQuik one-hand, magnetic chest clip makes buckling in and out struggle-free out-of-the-way spring assist harness system keeps straps in place, which means no more tangled toddlers cushions that are washer and, unlike most seats, dryer-safe (because who has time to line dry?) premium fabrics that keep kids comfortable and hold up wash after spill after wash after spill air Protect cushions with cell foam protects your child head's head from side impact.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Because they grow up so fast Built to grow with your child, from birth to 10 years, the Pria Max 3-in-1 Convertible Car Seat might just be the only car seat you’ll ever need. And, most importantly you can convert to new seat stages in mere minutes – because, trust us, growth spurts really do happen overnight.

Premium Details Out-of-the-Way Harness Unique spring-assist harness system keeps straps in place, which means no more tangled toddlers. ClipQuik Chest Clip One-hand, magnetic chest clip makes buckling in and out struggle-free. QuickFit Adjustment Integrated headrest and harness system makes it easy to customize the perfect fit for your growing child. Bonus points for no harness rethreading! Machine Washable & Dryer-Safe Easy off fabrics that keep little ones comfortable and hold up wash after spill after wash after spill.

Maxi-Cosi Pria Max 3-in-1 Convertible Car Seat With the Pria Max 3-in-1, you can take comfort in knowing that you’ll have a safe, comfortable car seat for your child, from birth to 10 years old. Maxi-Cosi Pria Max 3-in-1 Convertible Car Seat Maxi-Cosi Designed for Parenthood At Maxi-Cosi we believe there's only one way to parent. Your own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best car seat
reviews.reviewText: This seat has a lot of cushion to it. I love the chest buckle. Very easy to open and close. Best car seat ever

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great car seat. Would repurchase/ recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Car seat!
reviews.reviewText: This is our 2nd cosi maxi pria. I love it so much. It’s so plush and comfy for my kiddo and the dark color hides a lot.The newer features of the raised seat belts and easy clip on centerpiece is worth the extra $$.We have the older model as well and this one is just so much nicer with those small features. I feel like my little one is very safe in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hard to keep in place.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this on sale. Price is a bit on higher end. Very comfy but hard to keep in place in the car. Have a different brand in our other car and prefer that toddler seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great car seat!
reviews.reviewText: We had just bought a suburban and also have an explorer. Wanted a new seat for the new car so I chose this one. I am getting used to being able to unbuckle to magnetic chest clip with one hand still. It is a nice feature though. I love that my sons head doesnt fall straight down like it does in the other seat we have. I love having 2 cup holders. All in all I am very happy with this car seat and the price we paid for it. The only issue I have (and I have this with ALL seats these days) is that due to the bulk if the seat, it makes the passenger seat almost unusable. Even in a Suburban. I was hoping this would get better because it is absolutely horrible in the Explorer. It is somewhat better in this seat, but if there is someone in passenger seat, my son wont have much room to move his legs.....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit in Vehicle
reviews.reviewText: It is a great car seat, and I will buy again for another child. It is a little hard to install by myself in my Traverse, I like to have the seat belt as tight as possible. It is a bulky car seat for rear facing, but the comfort my toddler gets from it is worth it. He used to hate car rides, now he looks out the window or sleeps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super awesome car seat
reviews.reviewText: After four months, my son is about 16.5 lbs and his infant car seat was getting a little small. We still use them but I wanted something permanent in my car. This wasn’t the easiest to install, as I couldn’t tighten the belt as I wanted to. Since it’s such a big and bulky car seat, the front seat has to sit up really far when the pria 85 is fully reclined. I have a 2017 highlander.As far as comfort, my son has seemed to completely enjoy his car rides now. He’s up higher and has more room. Overall, this is a great car seat if your car is big enough for it and you have help installing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Product Great. Seller Not So Much
reviews.reviewText: We already own this car seat and love it. We were looking to buy a second for our younger child. However, after purchasing we decided to go a with a slimmer option for our older child. If you are considering buying this car seat from AlbeeBaby do yourself a favor and don’t. Make sure you are purchasing with Amazon as the seller. AlbeeBaby will make you responsible for the shipping costs of returning. This did not seem like that big of a deal until those costs were almost as much as the car seat.

This car seat is only usable from 6 months. This is appraiser an estimate as of now. It could be 9 months too.Too big for rare facing position.The bottom of the car seat seems to damage the seat leather.

La verdad tenía expectativas muy altas para este producto, sinceramente hice muchísimo research y vi mil reviews para llegar a este car seat.Lamentablemente no fue lo que necesitábamos, en primera instancia al recibirlo, estábamos súper contentos, es un car seat que se ve precioso y con una estética 100/100, pero nos dimos cuenta al poco tiempo de usarlo que el diseño era extraño y difícil de ajustar, las correas eran sumamente incómodas, de verdad, intentamos adaptarnos, pensando que era un tema de solo acomodarse bien y acostumbrarte a algo nuevo, para nuestra sorpresa, las correas aparte de no moverse de lugar tiene los colchoncitos que van en el área del cuello están cocidos, esto hace imposible moverlas, lo cual hace muy incómodo el acomodo para el bebé.Después de un mes de intentarlo, decidimos regresarlo, no tuvimos ni un problema con la devolución tanto del material como del dinero.
